subject: Track and Field
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: A top national competitor in events of 440, 600, 880 and 1,000 yards, Reggie Pearman was one of America’s outstanding middle-distance runners in the post-World War II era.
snippet: A top national competitor in events of 440, 600, 880 and 1,000 yards, Reggie Pearman was one of America’s outstanding middle-distance runners in the post-World War II era.
